newSession

VcoSession newSession(Authentication auth)
Creates an authenticated VcoSession using the provided Authentication object. The returned session can fail upon usage if the provided credentials are incorrect.

Parameters:
auth - cannot be null
Returns:
See Also:
UsernamePasswordAuthentication, SsoAuthentication, SsoAuthenticator
